title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler saves thousands of Jews from the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets must now plant an idea into someone's mind, a task that proves to be more difficult than expected.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a slow-witted man who witnesses and unwittingly influences several historical events in the 20th century United States.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns the shocking truth about reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's battle station.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer who skins his victims.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: After the Normandy invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Jurassic Park
description: During a preview tour, a theme park's genetically engineered dinosaurs run amok and endanger the lives of the park's visitors.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a mischievous demigod from enslaving humanity.

title: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent from the future to kill a young woman whose child will one day lead humanity's war against the machines.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social classes falls in love aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet.

title: The Prestige
description: Two stage magicians engage in a rivalry to create the ultimate stage illusion, with dangerous consequences.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrant and his army in a high-octane road chase.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a music conservatory where he is pushed to the limit by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the founders of the social-networking website, Facebook.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: 12 Years a Slave
description: In the pre-Civil War United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Gone Girl
description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

title: Her
description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: Young blade runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Shutter Island
description: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

title: Arrival
description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, bounty hunters seek shelter in a cabin, but the situation soon becomes hostile.

title: Moonlight
description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

title: The Shape of Water
description: At a top-secret research facility, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

title: Birdman
description: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

title: Logan
description: In a dystopian future, Logan and an ailing Professor X defend a young mutant pursued by dark forces.

title: Lady Bird
description: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.
Two young British soldiers during World War I are given an impossible mission: deliver a message deep in enemy territory.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City's fractured society, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral, transforming into the infamous criminal known as the Joker.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

title: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people and face a powerful enemy.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with five counterparts from other dimensions.

title: The Irishman
description: A mob hitman recalls his involvement with the rise of the American mafia and the disappearance of Jimmy Hoffa.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the death of a wealthy patriarch and unravels a web of secrets within the family.

title: Marriage Story
description: An incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford.

title: Dune
description: The son of a noble family is entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and the most vital element in the galaxy.

title: Tenet
description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, a protagonist embarks on a time-bending mission to prevent the collapse of the world.

title: Soul
description: A jazz musician gets stuck in the afterlife and embarks on a journey to return to his body and fulfill his life goals.

title: Nomadland
description: A woman in her sixties embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: Minari
description: A Korean family starts a farm in 1980s Arkansas, where they experience challenges in pursuit of their own American dream.

title: Promising Young Woman
description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who wronged her.

title: The Father
description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages, and begins to doubt his own perception of reality.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: The story of seven individuals on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Sound of Metal
description: A heavy-metal drummer's life is turned upside down when he begins to lose his hearing.

title: The Green Knight
description: King Arthur's headstrong nephew embarks on a daring quest to confront the Green Knight, a mysterious giant.

title: Don't Look Up
description: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy Earth.

title: The French Dispatch
description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when an old friend from the CIA turns up asking for help.

title: Eternals
description: A group of ancient heroes must come together to protect humanity from their oldest enemy, the Deviants.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: Shang-Chi, the master of unarmed weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

title: Luca
description: On the Italian Riviera, an unlikely but strong friendship grows between a human and a sea monster disguised as a human.

title: Encanto
description: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: The Suicide Squad
description: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker, and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X.

title: King Richard
description: A look at how tennis superstars Venus and Serena Williams became who they are after the coaching from their father, Richard Williams.

title: Spencer
description: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, England, Princess Diana decides to leave her marriage to Prince Charles.

title: The Power of the Dog
description: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

title: West Side Story
description: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

title: Nightmare Alley
description: An ambitious carny with a talent for manipulating people meets a female psychiatrist who is even more dangerous than he is.

title: CODA
description: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby must choose between pursuing her love of music and her obligations to her family.

title: Belfast
description: A young boy and his working-class Belfast family experience the tumultuous late 1960s.

title: The Lost Daughter
description: A woman's quiet seaside vacation takes an unsettling turn when her fixation on a young mother staying at a nearby villa awakens memories from her past.

title: House of Gucci
description: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her ambition begins to unravel the family's legacy and triggers a spiral of betrayal, decadence, and murder.

title: Tick, Tick... Boom!
description: On the cusp of his 30th birthday, a promising young theater composer navigates love, friendship, and the pressure to create something great before time runs out.

title: Drive My Car
description: After his wife's unexpected death, a renowned stage actor and director grapples with loss and takes on a new play while slowly finding solace with his chauffeur.

title: Don't Breathe
description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
description: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Tom Junod.

title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
description: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the 18th century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: Midsommar
description: A couple travels to Sweden to visit a rural hometown's fabled mid-summer festival, only to find themselves in the clutches of a sinister cult.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Marriage Story
description: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: Uncut Gems
description: With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hopes of staying afloat and alive.

title: The Farewell
description: A Chinese family discovers their grandmother has only a short while left to live and decide to keep her in the dark, scheduling a wedding to gather before she dies.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age.

title: The King
description: Hal, wayward prince and heir to the English throne, is crowned King Henry V after his tyrannical father dies.

title: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford.

title: Dunkirk
description: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

title: First Man
description: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

title: A Star Is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: The story of the legendary rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid.

title: Vice
description: The story of Dick Cheney, an unassuming bureaucratic Washington insider, who quietly wielded immense power as Vice President to George W. Bush, reshaping the country and the globe in ways still felt today.

title: Green Book
description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

title: Roma
description: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

title: The Favourite
description: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne, and her close friend Lady Sarah governs the country in her stead.

title: The Irishman
description: A mob hitman recalls his involvement with the rise of the American mafia and the disappearance of Jimmy Hoffa.

title: Judas and the Black Messiah
description: Bill O'Neal infiltrates the Black Panther Party per FBI Agent Mitchell and J. Edgar Hoover. As party chairman Fred Hampton ascends, falling for a fellow revolutionary en route, a battle wages for O'Neal's soul.

title: Nomadland
description: After losing everything in the Great Recession, a woman embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
description: The story of seven individuals on trial stemming from various charges surrounding the uprising at the 1968 Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Illinois.

title: Sound of Metal
description: A heavy-metal drummer's life is thrown into freefall when he begins to lose his hearing.

title: Ma Rainey's Black Bottom
description: During a recording session in 1920s Chicago, tensions arise between legendary blues singer Ma Rainey, her ambitious horn player, and the white management determined to control the uncontrollable 'Mother of the Blues.'

title: The Two Popes
description: Behind Vatican walls, the conservative Pope Benedict and the liberal future Pope Francis must find common ground to forge a new path for the Catholic Church.

title: The French Dispatch
description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city.

title: Don't Look Up
description: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy Earth.

title: Spencer
description: During her Christmas holidays with the royal family at the Sandringham estate in Norfolk, England, Princess Diana decides to leave her marriage to Prince Charles.

title: The Last Duel
description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

title: The Green Knight
description: King Arthur's headstrong nephew embarks on a daring quest to confront the Green Knight, a mysterious giant who appears at Camelot.

title: No Time to Die
description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

title: Malcolm & Marie
description: A filmmaker and his girlfriend return home following a celebratory movie premiere, as simmering tensions and painful revelations push them toward a romantic reckoning.

title: The Dig
description: An archaeologist embarks on the historically significant excavation of Sutton Hoo in 1938.

title: The Eyes of Tammy Faye
description: An intimate look at the extraordinary rise, fall, and redemption of televangelist Tammy Faye Bakker.

title: Judas and the Black Messiah
description: Offered a plea deal by the FBI, William O'Neal infiltrates the Illinois chapter of the Black Panther Party to gather intelligence on Chairman Fred Hampton.

title: C'mon C'mon
description: When his sister asks him to look after her son, a radio journalist embarks on a cross-country trip with his energetic nephew to show him life away from the big city.

title: Benedetta
description: A 17th-century nun in Italy suffers from disturbing religious and erotic visions.

title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
description: A Scottish lord becomes convinced by a trio of witches that he will become the next King of Scotland, and his ambitious wife supports him in his plans of seizing power.

title: Passing
description: In 1920s New York City, a Black woman finds her world upended when her life becomes intertwined with a former childhood friend who's passing as white.

title: Mass
description: Aftermath of a violent tragedy that affects the lives of two couples in different ways.

title: Petite Maman
description: Nelly has just lost her grandmother and is helping her parents clean out her mother's childhood home. One day, she meets a girl her age as she's building a treehouse.

title: The Card Counter
description: Redemption is the long game in Paul Schrader's The Card Counter. Told with Schrader's trademark cinematic intensity, the revenge thriller tells the story of an ex-military interrogator turned gambler.

title: Being the Ricardos
description: Follows Lucy and Desi as they face a crisis that could end their careers and another that could end their marriage.

title: The Hand of God
description: In 1980s Naples, Italy, a young boy experiences the joys and tragedies of ordinary life, underpinned by the arrival of soccer legend Diego Maradona.

title: The Worst Person in the World
description: Chronicles four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path.

title: Spiral
description: A criminal mastermind unleashes a twisted form of justice in Spiral, the terrifying new chapter from the book of Saw.

title: The Little Things
description: Two cops track down a serial killer, but their personal differences put them at odds.

title: Last Night in Soho
description: An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. But the glamour is not all it appears to be.

title: Wrath of Man
description: Mysterious and wild-eyed, a new security guard for a cash truck surprises his coworkers when he unleashes precision skills during a heist.

title: Finch
description: On a post-apocalyptic Earth, a robot, built to protect the life of his creator's beloved dog, learns about life, love, friendship, and what it means to be human.

title: Lamb
description: A childless couple in rural Iceland makes an alarming discovery one day in their sheep barn. They soon face the consequences of defying the will of nature.

title: Old
description: A vacationing family discovers that the secluded beach where they are staying is somehow causing them to age rapidly.

title: Zola
description: A stripper named Zola embarks on a wild road trip to Florida that quickly spirals out of control.

title: The Harder They Fall
description: When outlaw Nat Love discovers that his enemy Rufus Buck is being released from prison, he rounds up his gang to track Rufus down and seek revenge.

title: Nobody
description: A mild-mannered man finds his long-suppressed violent instincts triggered after his house is robbed, leading him to reveal his dark, hidden past.

title: The Night House
description: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets as she starts to experience strange occurrences in her lakeside home.

title: Cruella
description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil in 1970s London.

title: The Many Saints of Newark
description: Young Anthony Soprano is growing up in one of the most tumultuous eras in Newark, just as rival gangsters begin to rise up and challenge the all-powerful DiMeo crime family.

title: Stillwater
description: A father travels from Oklahoma to France to help his estranged daughter, who is in prison for a murder she claims she didn't commit.

title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw
description: A criminal mastermind unleashes a twisted form of justice in Spiral, the terrifying new chapter from the book of Saw.

title: The Woman in the Window
description: An agoraphobic woman living alone in New York begins spying on her new neighbors, only to witness a disturbing act of violence.

title: The Father
description: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages and begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind, and even the fabric of his reality.
